HomePage.title: CanScan - Canadian Product Scanner
HomePage.description: CanScan helps Canadians identify Canadian products through barcode and image scanning.

Hero.headline: Identify <highlight>Canadian</highlight> Products with a Simple Scan
Hero.subheadline: CanScan helps you discover and support Canadian businesses by instantly identifying Canadian products through barcode and image scanning.

FeatureSection.title: How CanScan Works
FeatureSection.description: Discover the powerful features that make CanScan the essential companion for Canadians looking to support local products.
FeatureSection.feature1Desc: Instantly scan product barcodes to identify Canadian-made products and learn more about their origin.
FeatureSection.feature2Desc: Take photos of products without barcodes and let our AI identify if it's made in Canada.
FeatureSection.feature3Desc: Discover nearby stores that sell Canadian products with our integrated map feature.
FeatureSection.feature4Desc: Access our extensive database of Canadian products to make informed shopping decisions.
FeatureSection.imageRecDesc: For products without barcodes or when shopping online, our image recognition technology can:
FeatureSection.imageRecItem1: Identify products from a simple photo
FeatureSection.imageRecItem2: Detect "Made in Canada" labels and symbols
FeatureSection.imageRecItem3: Recognize packaging that indicates Canadian origin
FeatureSection.imageRecItem4: Work with screenshots from online shopping sites
FeatureSection.aiInsightsDesc: Our advanced AI analyzes products to provide deeper insights about Canadian options. Get access to:
FeatureSection.aiInsightsItem4: Supporting small vs. large Canadian businesses
FeatureSection.barcodeScanDesc: Our barcode scanning technology quickly identifies Canadian products with just a simple scan. Get instant information about:
FeatureSection.barcodeScanItem4: Similar Canadian alternatives for imported products
FeatureSection.scanHistoryDesc: Keep track of all your scanned products and build a personalized Canadian shopping profile:
FeatureSection.scanHistoryItem1: View complete history of scanned products
FeatureSection.scanHistoryItem3: Save favorite Canadian products for future reference
FeatureSection.scanHistoryItem4: Share Canadian product discoveries with friends

CanadianProducts.title: Canadian Products
CanadianProducts.description: Explore a variety of high-quality products made in Canada that you can identify using CanScan.
CanadianProducts.productMapleDesc: Pure maple syrup from Quebec forests. A sweet Canadian tradition.
CanadianProducts.productCheeseDesc: Award-winning Canadian artisan cheese made from local dairy.
CanadianProducts.productBlanketDesc: Handcrafted wool blanket from Canadian wool. Perfect for cold winter nights.
CanadianProducts.productJacketDesc: Designed for harsh Canadian winters. Waterproof, windproof, and very warm.
CanadianProducts.productAppDesc: Developed by Canadian software engineers to help you in daily life.
CanadianProducts.productSkincareDesc: Made with Canadian botanicals harvested from pristine natural environments.

DownloadCTA.title: Download CanScan Today
DownloadCTA.description: Join thousands of Canadians who use CanScan to discover and support local products. Download the app for free on iOS and Android.
DownloadCTA.testimonial: "CanScan has completely changed how I shop. Now I can easily find and support Canadian businesses with just a quick scan!"

Footer.description: Helping Canadians identify and support local products through advanced scanning technology.

AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Empowering Canadians to discover and support local products.
AboutPage.missionP1: At CanScan, we believe in the power of supporting local Canadian businesses and manufacturers. Our mission is to make it easy for Canadians to identify and purchase products made right here in Canada, strengthening our economy and reducing environmental impact through shorter supply chains.
AboutPage.missionP2: We developed CanScan to bridge the information gap between consumers who want to support local products and the many excellent Canadian manufacturers who produce high-quality goods. By simply scanning a barcode or taking a picture of a product, CanScan instantly tells you if it's made in Canada and provides additional information about the company behind it.
AboutPage.missionQuote: "We envision a future where Canadians can easily make informed choices to support local businesses, creating a stronger, more sustainable economy for all of us."
AboutPage.grahamDesc: Leading the development of CanScan to help Canadians make informed shopping choices and support local businesses.
AboutPage.hiringDesc: We're seeking an experienced advisor with AI expertise to help shape the future of Canadian shopping and enhance our product recognition capabilities. If you're passionate about AI and supporting local businesses, contact us at careers@canscanapp.ca
AboutPage.lunaDesc: Our Frenchie Canadian team member bringing joy and enthusiasm while ensuring our users have the best possible experience. Expert in belly rubs and quality assurance treats.
AboutPage.valuesDesc: CanScan is built on core Canadian values that guide everything we do:
AboutPage.value1Desc: We believe in strengthening local communities by promoting Canadian businesses and products.
AboutPage.value2Desc: Buying local reduces transportation emissions and supports more sustainable production practices.
AboutPage.value3Desc: We provide clear, accurate information about product origins to help consumers make informed choices.
AboutPage.value4Desc: We embrace Canadian innovation to create technology that makes a difference in people's daily lives.

FeaturesPage.heroSubtitle: Discover all the powerful tools to help you identify and support Canadian products.
FeaturesPage.barcodeDesc: Our advanced barcode scanning technology quickly identifies products and tells you:
FeaturesPage.barcodeItem1: If the product is made in Canada
FeaturesPage.barcodeItem4: Similar Canadian alternatives if the product is imported
FeaturesPage.imageRecDesc: For products without barcodes or when browsing online, our image recognition can:
FeaturesPage.imageRecItem3: Detect "Made in Canada" labels and symbols
FeaturesPage.imageRecItem4: Work with screenshots from online shopping
FeaturesPage.mapDesc: Discover stores near you that carry Canadian products:
FeaturesPage.mapItem3: User reviews and ratings of local shops
FeaturesPage.mapItem4: Directions to stores with your preferred map app
FeaturesPage.databaseDesc: Browse our extensive database of Canadian products even without scanning. Filter by category, province, or certification type.
FeaturesPage.favoritesDesc: Save your favorite Canadian products, create shopping lists, and share them with friends and family.
FeaturesPage.recommendationsDesc: Get product suggestions based on your preferences and previous scans. Discover new Canadian brands you'll love.
FeaturesPage.techDesc: CanScan uses cutting-edge technology to provide accurate information about Canadian products.
FeaturesPage.mlDesc: Our image recognition system uses advanced machine learning algorithms that continuously improve as more Canadians use the app.
FeaturesPage.compDbDesc: We maintain one of the largest databases of Canadian products, updated daily with new items and information.
FeaturesPage.fastScanDesc: Get instant results even in poor lighting conditions or with damaged barcodes thanks to our optimized scanning technology.
FeaturesPage.offlineDesc: The core scanning functionality works without an internet connection, with cached data for the most common Canadian products.

SupportPage.heroSubtitle: Get help with CanScan app and find answers to common questions.
SupportPage.faqDesc: Find answers to the most common questions about using CanScan.
SupportPage.faq1Q: How does CanScan identify Canadian products?
SupportPage.faq1A: CanScan uses advanced image recognition and barcode scanning technology along with our comprehensive database of Canadian products. When you scan a product, our app checks it against our database to determine if it's made in Canada. We also look for specific Canadian certification labels and manufacturing information.
SupportPage.faq2Q: Is CanScan available for both iOS and Android?
SupportPage.faq2A: Yes! CanScan is available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store.
SupportPage.faq3Q: Does CanScan work without an internet connection?
SupportPage.faq3A: CanScan's core scanning functionality works offline, but for the most comprehensive results, an internet connection is recommended. When offline, the app can still identify many common Canadian products that are cached in the app's local database.
SupportPage.faq4Q: How accurate is CanScan's product identification?
SupportPage.faq4A: CanScan has a high accuracy rate for barcoded products in our database. For image recognition, accuracy depends on the clarity of the image and product packaging. Our system continuously improves as more users scan products, adding to our collective knowledge base.
SupportPage.faq5Q: Is my data private when using CanScan?
SupportPage.faq5A: We take privacy seriously. Your personal information is never sold to third parties. We only collect anonymized scanning data to improve our product database. You can review our full privacy policy for more details on how we handle your information.
SupportPage.faq6Q: How can I report an incorrectly identified product?
SupportPage.faq6A: If you believe a product has been incorrectly identified, you can report it directly in the app. Simply tap the 'Report Issue' button on the product details screen and provide information about the error. Our team reviews all reports to continuously improve our database.
SupportPage.contactEmailDesc: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
SupportPage.contactWhatsappDesc: Message our support team on WhatsApp for quick assistance.
SupportPage.contactSocialDesc: Connect with us on social media for quick responses.
SupportPage.communityDesc: Connect with other CanScan users, share tips, and help improve our Canadian product database.

DownloadPage.heroSubtitle: Get the app that helps you discover and support Canadian products.
DownloadPage.feature1Desc: Instantly scan barcodes to identify Canadian-made products.
DownloadPage.feature2Desc: Take photos of products to check if they're made in Canada.
DownloadPage.feature3Desc: Discover nearby stores that sell Canadian products.
DownloadPage.step1Desc: CanScan is available for both iOS and Android devices. Click the appropriate download button above.
DownloadPage.step2Desc: After being redirected to the App Store or Google Play, tap "Install" or "Get" to download the app.
DownloadPage.step3Desc: Open the app and follow the prompts to create a free account or sign in if you already have one.
DownloadPage.step4Desc: You're all set! Start scanning products to discover Canadian-made goods.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.introP1: At CanScan, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application or website. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.
PrivacyPage.collectP1: We may collect information about you in various ways when you use our App:
PrivacyPage.collectList1: Personal Data: While using our App, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. This may include email address, name, and phone number.
PrivacyPage.collectList2: Usage Data: We may also collect information that your device sends whenever you use our App, such as the type of device you use, your device's unique ID, your IP address, operating system, browser type, and app usage patterns.
PrivacyPage.collectList3: Product Data: When you scan products with our App, we collect information about the products you scan, including barcode information, product images, and identification results.
PrivacyPage.useP1: We use the information we collect to:
PrivacyPage.useList1: Provide, maintain, and improve our App and services
PrivacyPage.useList2: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
PrivacyPage.useList4: Send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages
PrivacyPage.useList5: Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
PrivacyPage.useList6: Improve our product database to better identify Canadian products
PrivacyPage.useList7: Analyze how you use the App to improve our services
PrivacyPage.shareP1: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:
PrivacyPage.shareList1: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party vendors, service providers, and other partners who help us provide and improve our App.
PrivacyPage.shareList2: Children's Privacy: Our App is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
PrivacyPage.shareList3: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
PrivacyPage.shareList4: Business Transfers: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
PrivacyPage.securityP1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPage.rightsP1: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
PrivacyPage.rightsList1: The right to access the personal information we have about you
PrivacyPage.rightsList2: The right to request correction of inaccurate personal information
PrivacyPage.rightsList3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
PrivacyPage.rightsList4: The right to withdraw consent at any time
PrivacyPage.changesP1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date at the top.
PrivacyPage.contactP1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.acceptanceP1: By accessing or using CanScan (the "App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing the App. The materials contained in this App are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.
TermsPage.licenseP1: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on CanScan's App for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
TermsPage.licenseList2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display;
TermsPage.licenseList3: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on CanScan's App;
TermsPage.licenseList4: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
TermsPage.licenseList5: Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.
TermsPage.licenseP2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by CanScan at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

CanScan makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
TermsPage.disclaimerP2: Further, CanScan does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its App or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this App.
TermsPage.identificationP1: CanScan attempts to accurately identify Canadian products through barcode scanning and image recognition technology. However, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy in all cases. The identification results provided by the App should be used as a guide only and not as definitive product information.
TermsPage.identificationP2: Users are encouraged to verify product information through official product packaging or manufacturer websites when making important purchasing decisions.
TermsPage.limitationsP1: In no event shall CanScan or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on CanScan's App, even if CanScan or a CanScan authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

TermsPage.accuracyP1: The materials appearing on CanScan's App could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. CanScan does not warrant that any of the materials on its App are accurate, complete, or current. CanScan may make changes to the materials contained on its App at any time without notice. However, CanScan does not make any commitment to update the materials.
TermsPage.linksP1: CanScan has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its App and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by CanScan of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
TermsPage.modificationsP1: CanScan may revise these Terms of Service for its App at any time without notice. By using this App, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms of Service.
TermsPage.governingLawP1: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Canada and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
TermsPage.contactP1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
